s1.title: Lists
s1.p: As Avalon was previously a Java Apache project before it moved to the Jakarta Apache Project, there are two mailing list archives. The current archives and the historic archives. For details on how to subscribe to the Avalon mailing lists see the Jakarta wide Mailing list details.

ul.li:
Jakarta Apache Avalon Mailing list
Archives

Java Apache Avalon Mailing list
Archives
(Historic)

More complete Java Apache Avalon Mailing list
Archives
(Historic)
